trans-unit.source: Contains a read-only collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: Contiene una raccolta di sola lettura di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone"> </xref> controlli.

trans-unit.source: The WebPartZoneCollection class contains the collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> controls that exist on a Web Parts page.
trans-unit.target: La classe WebPartZoneCollection contiene la raccolta di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>i controlli presenti in una pagina Web part.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>

trans-unit.source: It is used primarily by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control to track and manage all the zones.
trans-unit.target: Viene usato principalmente dal <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controllo per rilevare e gestire tutte le zone.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control keeps a reference to the collection of zones on a page in its read-only <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.Zones%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controllo mantiene un riferimento alla raccolta di aree di una pagina nella relativa proprietà di sola lettura <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.Zones%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.Zones%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: The WebPartZoneCollection class is useful when you want to carry out operations on multiple zones or their contents at the same time, or when you need to locate a particular zone and examine or change its contents.
trans-unit.target: La classe WebPartZoneCollection è utile quando si desidera eseguire operazioni su più aree o il relativo contenuto nello stesso momento, o quando è necessario individuare una zona specifica ed esaminare o modificare il relativo contenuto.

trans-unit.source: Although the collection of zones itself is read-only and you cannot change the size of the collection object itself, you can still get references to the individual zones within the collection, and when you have a reference to an individual zone object, you can change its property values.
trans-unit.target: Anche se la raccolta di zone stesso è di sola lettura e non è possibile modificare le dimensioni dell'oggetto raccolta stesso, è comunque possibile ottenere i riferimenti alle singole aree all'interno della raccolta e quando è presente un riferimento a un oggetto singolo orario, è possibile modificare i valori delle proprietà.

trans-unit.source: The WebPartZoneCollection class has two constructors.
trans-unit.target: La classe WebPartZoneCollection dispone di due costruttori.

trans-unit.source: The first one, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneCollection.%23ctor>, simply initializes an empty instance of a new WebPartZoneCollection.
trans-unit.target: Il primo, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneCollection.%23ctor>, semplicemente Inizializza un'istanza vuota di un nuovo WebPartZoneCollection.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneCollection.%23ctor>

trans-unit.source: The second one, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneCollection.%23ctor%28System.Collections.ICollection%29>, initializes a collection by passing in an existing collection of zones.
trans-unit.target: Il secondo, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneCollection.%23ctor%28System.Collections.ICollection%29>, Inizializza una raccolta tramite il passaggio di una raccolta esistente di zone.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneCollection.%23ctor%28System.Collections.ICollection%29>

trans-unit.source: The WebPartZoneCollection class contains an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneCollection.Item%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: La classe WebPartZoneCollection contiene un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneCollection.Item%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneCollection.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property allows you to locate a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> control within the collection by passing in a string identifier.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà consente di individuare un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>controllo all'interno della raccolta tramite il passaggio di un identificatore di stringa.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>

trans-unit.source: The zone is located by matching the string identifier to the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zone.
trans-unit.target: La zona viene individuata creando una corrispondenza tra l'identificatore di stringa per il valore della <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>proprietà in un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>fuso.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>

trans-unit.source: The WebPartZoneCollection class also has several methods that are useful for examining or accessing its contents.
trans-unit.target: La classe WebPartZoneCollection include anche diversi metodi che consentono di esaminare il contenuto o accedere.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneCollection.Contains%2A> method determines whether a particular zone exists in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneCollection.Contains%2A>metodo determina se un particolare fuso presente nella raccolta.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneCollection.Contains%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneCollection.CopyTo%2A> method copies the collection to an array of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> objects.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneCollection.CopyTo%2A>metodo copia la raccolta in una matrice di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>oggetti.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneCollection.CopyTo%2A>

trans-unit.source: Finally, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneCollection.IndexOf%2A> method returns the index of a particular zone within the collection.
trans-unit.target: Infine, il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneCollection.IndexOf%2A>metodo restituisce l'indice di una zona specifica all'interno della raccolta.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneCollection.IndexOf%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes an empty instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza un'istanza vuota del <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneCollection"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control uses this constructor within its own constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneCollection> class for a Web Parts page.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controllo utilizza questo costruttore all'interno del proprio costruttore per inizializzare una nuova istanza di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneCollection>classe per una pagina Web part.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneCollection"></xref> class by passing in a collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza un'istanza di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneCollection"> </xref> classe passando una raccolta di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone"> </xref> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: Use the WebPartZoneCollection constructor when you want to create a custom collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> objects to carry out programmatic operations on them.
trans-unit.target: Quando si desidera creare una raccolta personalizzata di utilizzare il costruttore WebPartZoneCollection <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>oggetti per eseguire le operazioni a livello di codice su di essi.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>

trans-unit.source: For example, you could access the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.Zones%2A> property and create a subset of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> objects on a Web Parts page, assigning them to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneCollection> object, and then carry out operations on the child controls or various properties of only that subset of zones.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, è possibile accedere il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.Zones%2A>proprietà e creare un sottoinsieme di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>gli oggetti in una pagina Web part, assegnandoli a un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneCollection>dell'oggetto e quindi eseguire le operazioni dei controlli figlio e varie proprietà di solo il sottoinsieme delle zone.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.Zones%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone"> </xref> oggetti.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: The collection of zones is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: La raccolta di aree è <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: One of the objects in the collection is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> or is not of type <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uno degli oggetti nella raccolta è <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> o non è di tipo <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether a particular zone exists in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un valore che indica se un particolare fuso esiste nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The Contains method enables you to check a particular <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> object and determine whether it is in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo Contains consente di verificare un particolare <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>dell'oggetto e determinare se è presente in un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneCollection>insieme.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone"></xref> that is checked to determine whether it is in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone"> </xref> che viene controllato per determinare se è nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether a particular zone is in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Valore booleano che indica se un particolare fuso è presente nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Copies the collection to an array of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Copia la raccolta in una matrice di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"> </xref> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: The CopyTo method is useful when you want to create a custom array that can contain the zones in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneCollection> collection, a subset of those zones, or a superset of those zones.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo CopyTo è utile quando si desidera creare una matrice di tipo personalizzata che può contenere le zone di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneCollection>insieme, un subset di tali zone o un superset di tali zone.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneCollection>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref> array to contain the copied collection.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"> </xref> matrice per contenere l'insieme copiato.

trans-unit.source: The starting point in the array at which to place the collection contents.
trans-unit.target: Il punto iniziale nella matrice in corrispondenza del quale inserire il contenuto della raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Returns the position of a particular member of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce la posizione di un membro specifico della raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The IndexOf method is useful if you have multiple <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> zones on a Web Parts page, and you need to know the ordinal position of one zone relative to the other zones.
trans-unit.target: Metodo IndexOf è utile se si dispone di più <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>zone in una pagina Web part ed è necessario conoscere la posizione ordinale di una zona rispetto alle altre.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref> that is a member of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"> </xref> che fa parte della raccolta.

trans-unit.source: An integer that indicates the position of a particular object in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Valore intero che indica la posizione di un oggetto specifico nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Returns a specific member of the collection by passing in an integer.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un membro specifico della raccolta tramite il passaggio di un numero intero.

trans-unit.source: The Item property enables you to access a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> object within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneCollection> collection by using an index number that represents its ordinal position in the collection.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà dell'elemento consente di accedere a un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>oggetto all'interno di un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneCollection>insieme con un numero di indice che rappresenta la posizione ordinale nella raccolta.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>

trans-unit.source: The index number for a particular <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone"></xref> within a collection.
trans-unit.target: Il numero di indice per un particolare <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone"> </xref> all'interno di una raccolta.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone"></xref> at the specified index in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone"> </xref> in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Returns a specific member of the collection by passing in a unique identifier.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un membro specifico della raccolta tramite il passaggio di un identificatore univoco.

trans-unit.source: The Item property enables you to access a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> object within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneCollection> collection by using a string identifier for a particular zone.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà dell'elemento consente di accedere una <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>oggetto all'interno di un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneCollection>raccolta mediante un identificatore di stringa per una determinata area.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>

trans-unit.source: All matching on string identifiers is case-insensitive.
trans-unit.target: Tutti gli identificatori di stringa non è rilevante.

trans-unit.source: The unique identifier for a particular <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone"></xref> within the collection.
trans-unit.target: L'identificatore univoco per un particolare <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone"> </xref> all'interno della raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The first in the collection whose ID equals the value of id.
trans-unit.target: Il primo nella raccolta il cui ID è uguale al valore di id .
